articles.title: Millie Bobby Brown reveals she's enrolled at Indiana's Purdue University to study human services - Daily Mail
articles.description: Millie Bobby Brown has enrolled at Purdue University in Indiana to study human services.
articles.content:
Millie Bobby Brown has enrolled at Purdue University in Indiana to study human services.
